registration.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with the specified email address already exists
registration.INCORRECT_PARAMETERS: User with the specified email address already exists
registration.step1: Register in the form on the left
registration.step2: You will receive a confirmation email

request.impact_info: Information on the impact of the request
request.request_info: All information you fill in here is stored in real time.
request.request_va_more_info:
All information you fill in here is stored in real time, so you can always come back to this form and finish it at a later stage. Only after you hit the 'Submit'-button at the end of the form the request gets forwarded to VA Coordinators for evaluation. Keep in mind that the limit for text fields is 2000 characters.

After submitting the form, the registered request will be available in the overview of all requests, which can be reached via the 'Requests'-option in the main menu. Then VA coordinators involved will be able to react on it in order to fine-tune the request in cooperation with the requester. During this evaluation process the original requester stays in the lead for changing/adding information in the request registration. When the VA coordinators are satisfied with the information provided for their institution and have accepted the part of the request for their institution, the request is accepted and processed.
request.request_ta_more_info:
All information you fill in here is stored in real time, so you can always come back to this form and finish it at a later stage. Only after you hit the 'Submit'-button at the end of the form the request gets forwarded to TA Coordinators for evaluation. Keep in mind that the limit for text fields is 2000 characters.

After submitting the form, the registered request will be available in the overview of all requests, which can be reached via the 'Requests'-option in the main menu. Then TA coordinators involved will be able to react on it in order to fine-tune the request in cooperation with the requester. During this evaluation process the original requester stays in the lead for changing/adding information in the request registration. When the TA coordinators are satisfied with the information provided for their institution and have accepted the part of the request for their institution, the request is accepted and processed.
request.submit_update_title: Is your request ready to be updated?
request.submit_update_text_va: If you have corrected and/or completed your request according to the instructions of the VA coordinators as provided via their comments, you can submit your changed request for approval again via the “Update request”-button. This is NOT yet the final submission. The final Submission will be dealt with via peer review after all VA coordinators from the digitising institutes involved have approved your request.
request.submit_update_text_ta: If you have corrected and/or completed your request according to the instructions of the TA coordinators as provided via their comments, you can submit your changed request for approval again via the “Update request”-button. This is NOT yet the final submission. Your request has to be approved by TA coordinators. Until then you still can update your request according to his/her comments. The final assessment of your request will be dealt with via scoring after the call has been closed.
request.submit_title: Is your request ready to be made public?
request.submit_text: If you submit, than your submission will become available for the VA coordinators to comment on and to approve. This is NOT yet the final submission. The final submission will be dealt with via review after all VA coordinators from the digitising institutions involved have approved your request.
request.request_approve_question: Are you sure you approve this request?
request.request_unapprove_question: Are you sure you no longer approve this request?

help.title: Questions and Feedback
help.sub1: The helpdesk is a separate system from ELViS. Your email will be turned into a ticket in the helpdesk, and you will receive an automated confirmation message that your ticket has been received and that it will be dealt with as soon as possible. The message will contain a link for viewing the progress status of your ticket.
help.sub2: The helpdesk team are committed to answering your queries in a timely and efficient manner (at least within 3 days of submitting your request), but please be aware that response times may vary during busy times.
help.sub3: Please be aware of which types of queries the helpdesk deals with before submitting(see table below).
help.elaboration: What happens when I have emailed the helpdesk?
help.form_title: You are welcome to use the form below to ask for help or to give your feedback.
help.subject: Subject
help.footer: Your suggestions for improvements or new functionality might be made public. For example they may be put in GitHub to aid further development of the service.

file_handling.drop_files: Drop your file(s) here or click to upload
file_handling.limit: The filesize exceeds {limit} Mb, please upload a smaller file
file_handling.upload_error: Something went wrong uploading the form, please try again

400.title: Bad request
400.description: Your browser made a request that the server could not understand...

401.title: Not authorized
401.description: You are not authorized to view this content...

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: You don't have permission to access or edit this content...

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for could not be found...

500.title: Server error
500.description: The server encountered a temporary error and could not complete your request. Please refresh the page or try again in 30 seconds...

502.title: Server error
502.description: The server encountered a temporary error and could not complete your request. Please refresh the page or try again in 30 seconds...

default.title: Error
default.description: Something went wrong. You could try to refresh the page or use the Back button...
